org.switchyard.admin.mbean

Interface ComponentServiceMXBean

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MessageMetricsMXBean

    public interface ComponentServiceMXBean
extends MessageMetricsMXBean
    Management interface for a component service provided in a SwitchYard application.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApplicationMXBean getApplication()
      The application which contains this component service.
      String getImplementation()
      The implementation type used for the component service.
      String getImplementationConfiguration()
      The configuration descriptor for the service implementation.
      String getInterface()
      The component service interface.
      String getName()
      The component service name.
      List<String> getReferences()
      List of reference names consumed by this service.
      List<String> getServiceOperations()
      List of operation names provided by this service.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.switchyard.admin.mbean.MessageMetricsMXBean

        getAverageProcessingTime, getFaultCount, getMaxProcessingTime, getMinProcessingTime, getSuccessCount, getTotalCount, getTotalProcessingTime, reset

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        The component service name.
        Returns:
        the name of this service.

      • getImplementation

        String getImplementation()
        The implementation type used for the component service.
        Returns:
        the implementation type used to implement this service.

      • getImplementationConfiguration

        String getImplementationConfiguration()
        The configuration descriptor for the service implementation.
        Returns:
        implementation configuration as a string

      • getInterface

        String getInterface()
        The component service interface.
        Returns:
        the interface implemented by this service.

      • getServiceOperations

        List<String> getServiceOperations()
        List of operation names provided by this service.
        Returns:
        the operations exposed by this service.

      • getReferences

        List<String> getReferences()
        List of reference names consumed by this service.
        Returns:
        the references required by this service.

      • getApplication

        ApplicationMXBean getApplication()
        The application which contains this component service.
        Returns:
        the application which exports this service.
